title: Bundesbank Bank API Wrapper
text: goal bundesbank provide simple interface Bundesbank API.

title: Bundesbank Bank API Wrapper
text: can install development version bundesbank GitHub :

title: Bundesbank Bank API Wrapper
code: library(bundesbank)  # fetch 10 year daily yield curve yield_curve <- bb_data(   flow = "BBSIS",   key = "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01" ) yield_curve #> # A tibble: 1,030 × 5 #>    date       id                                              title  freq  value #>    <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>  <chr> <dbl> #>  1 2020-01-02 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.16 #>  2 2020-01-03 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  3 2020-01-06 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  4 2020-01-07 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  5 2020-01-08 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  6 2020-01-09 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #>  7 2020-01-10 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.2  #>  8 2020-01-13 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.19 #>  9 2020-01-14 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.17 #> 10 2020-01-15 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #> # ℹ 1,020 more rows  library(ggplot2)  ggplot(yield_curve, aes(x = date, y = value)) +   geom_line() +   labs(x = "Date", y = "Yield")

title: Returns available code lists — bb_codelist
text: Returns available code lists

title: Returns available code lists — bb_codelist
text: id character(1) id query. Default NULL. lang character(1) language query, either "en" "de". Default "en".

title: Returns available code lists — bb_codelist
text: data.frame available code lists. columns : id id code list name name code list

title: Returns available code lists — bb_codelist
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-metadata

title: Returns available code lists — bb_codelist
code: bb_codelist() #> # A tibble: 3,971 × 2 #>    id                          name                                 #>    <chr>                       <chr>                                #>  1 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets / Liabilities                 #>  2 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets                               #>  3 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Liabilities                          #>  4 CL_BBK_ACIP_DENOMINATION    Denomination                         #>  5 CL_BBK_ACIP_DENOMINATION    Euro                                 #>  6 CL_BBK_ACIP_INSTRUMENT      Balance sheet position               #>  7 CL_BBK_ACIP_INSTRUMENT      Total financial assets / liabilities #>  8 CL_BBK_ACIP_INSTRUMENT      Deposits                             #>  9 CL_BBK_ACIP_INSTRUMENT      Currency                             #> 10 CL_BBK_ACIP_INSTRUMENT      Deposits up to 1 year                #> # ℹ 3,961 more rows # or filter by id bb_codelist("CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY") #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   id                          name                 #>   <chr>                       <chr>                #> 1 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets / Liabilities #> 2 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets               #> 3 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Liabilities

title: Returns available concepts — bb_concept
code: bb_concept() #> # A tibble: 2,782 × 2 #>    id          name                                          #>    <chr>       <chr>                                         #>  1 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit and loss                               #>  2 CS_BBK_BSPL Frequency (BBk)                               #>  3 CS_BBK_BSPL Area (countries, list of countries), BBk only #>  4 CS_BBK_BSPL Adjustment (BBk)                              #>  5 CS_BBK_BSPL Reference sector breakdown                    #>  6 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit/Loss Item                              #>  7 CS_BBK_BSPL Original maturity                             #>  8 CS_BBK_BSPL Data type                                     #>  9 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart area                              #> 10 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart Sector                            #> # ℹ 2,772 more rows # or filter by id bb_concept("CS_BBK_BSPL") #> # A tibble: 38 × 2 #>    id          name                                          #>    <chr>       <chr>                                         #>  1 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit and loss                               #>  2 CS_BBK_BSPL Frequency (BBk)                               #>  3 CS_BBK_BSPL Area (countries, list of countries), BBk only #>  4 CS_BBK_BSPL Adjustment (BBk)                              #>  5 CS_BBK_BSPL Reference sector breakdown                    #>  6 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit/Loss Item                              #>  7 CS_BBK_BSPL Original maturity                             #>  8 CS_BBK_BSPL Data type                                     #>  9 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart area                              #> 10 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart Sector                            #> # ℹ 28 more rows

what: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
text: Returns data given flow key

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
code: bb_data(   flow,   key,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
text: flow character(1) flow query, 5-8 characters. See bb_dataflow() available flows. key character(1) key query. start_period character(1) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., "2019") YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period character(1) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
text: data.frame requested data. columns : date date observation id id dataflow title title dataflow freq frequency dataflow value value observation

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bb_data
code: # fetch all data for a given flow and key bb_data("BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A") #> # A tibble: 6,715 × 5 #>    date       id                                              title  freq  value #>    <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>  <chr> <dbl> #>  1 1997-08-07 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.76 #>  2 1997-08-08 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.76 #>  3 1997-08-11 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.75 #>  4 1997-08-12 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.72 #>  5 1997-08-13 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.77 #>  6 1997-08-14 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.74 #>  7 1997-08-15 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.72 #>  8 1997-08-18 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.72 #>  9 1997-08-19 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.66 #> 10 1997-08-20 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily  5.71 #> # ℹ 6,705 more rows  # specified period (start date-end date) for daily data bb_data(   "BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01",   end_period = "2020-08-01" ) #> # A tibble: 148 × 5 #>    date       id                                              title  freq  value #>    <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>  <chr> <dbl> #>  1 2020-01-02 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.16 #>  2 2020-01-03 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  3 2020-01-06 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  4 2020-01-07 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  5 2020-01-08 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  6 2020-01-09 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #>  7 2020-01-10 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.2  #>  8 2020-01-13 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.19 #>  9 2020-01-14 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.17 #> 10 2020-01-15 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #> # ℹ 138 more rows # or only specify the start date bb_data(   "BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01" ) #> # A tibble: 1,035 × 5 #>    date       id                                              title  freq  value #>    <date>     <chr>                                           <chr>  <chr> <dbl> #>  1 2020-01-02 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.16 #>  2 2020-01-03 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  3 2020-01-06 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  4 2020-01-07 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  5 2020-01-08 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.27 #>  6 2020-01-09 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #>  7 2020-01-10 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.2  #>  8 2020-01-13 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.19 #>  9 2020-01-14 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.17 #> 10 2020-01-15 D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A Yield… daily -0.22 #> # title: Returns available data structures — bb_data_structure
code: bb_data_structure() #> # A tibble: 72 × 2 #>    id        name                                                                #>    <chr>     <chr>                                                               #>  1 BBK_BSPL  Profit and loss                                                     #>  2 BBK_DOES  Short-term economic indicators (classified by economic sector)      #>  3 BBK_ERX   ECB euro reference exchange rates, exchange rates in particular co… #>  4 BBK_ESBOP External sector Balance of Payments according to BPM6               #>  5 BBK_EXBS  Business and consumer surveys of foreign countries                  #>  6 BBK_DOSC  System of  indicators for the German commercial real estate market  #>  7 BBK_DOSR  System of indicators for the German residential property market     #>  8 BBK_EXNA  National Accounts of foreign countries                              #>  9 BBK_EXPR  Consumer Prices of foreign countries                                #> 10 BBK_EXEI  Leading indicators of foreign countries                             #> # ℹ 62 more rows # or filter by id bb_data_structure("BBK_BSPL") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   id       name            #>   <chr>    <chr>           #> 1 BBK_BSPL Profit and loss
